website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality translucent powder at an excellent price point.
pros: The powder feels silky and lightweight on your skin
Effectively blurs imperfections while keeping makeup in place
Formula never settles into fine lines or wrinkles
Powder sits at a slightly lower price point than some of its competitors
cons: Powder has sheer, sparkle-like finish that may not fit every occasion

website_summaries.verdict: You don't need a heavy hand when applying this powder/sunscreen combination, but with proper application, you'll get attractive results whether you wear it with liquid foundation or on bare skin.

Blends easily and gives skin a soft, illuminating glow
cons: Can be cakey if too much is applied
The remodeled packaging that includes an adjustable dispenser is awkward to use

customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, but vendor swapped products. This was sold as +SPF25. Vendor sticker said so, but product labeling underneath did not indicate SPF. I had received a similar product from the same line. Still useful and a good product (I've used both), but not what I ordered.

customer_reviews.text: The powder itself worked fine, however, it seems that the container had been exposed to the sun because the top began cracking shortly after I began using it (opening/closing the lid). This isn't the 1st time I use the product or similar products from this brand and this hadn't happened before, which made me question the product itself. I was disappointed
